languages.text: Нечистое дыхание Дедушки Нургла отравило речи преподобного Иеронимуса. Проповедуя, что все вокруг есть тлен и скверна, он более не призывал к очищению, но лишь мучил души своей паствы. Отчаявшиеся и алчущие утешения люди готовы были поклониться любой силе, обещавшей покой и отсутствие страданий.

The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.
languages.original_text: Нечистое дыхание Дедушки Нургла отравило речи преподобного Иеронимуса. Проповедуя, что все вокруг есть тлен и скверна, он более не призывал к очищению, но лишь мучил души своей паствы. Отчаявшиеся и алчущие утешения люди готовы были поклониться любой силе, обещавшей покой и отсутствие страданий.

traits.locale_text: The wicked breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Revered Hieronymus. Preaching that everything is rot and taint, he no longer called for purification, only tormenting the souls of his flock. Fallen in despair and craving for solace, people were willing to bow to any force that would promise peace and relief from suffering.

Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

languages.text: 慈父纳垢那令人作呕的呼吸腐化了希罗尼穆斯牧师的布道。他开始宣扬无处不在的腐烂与污秽，折磨牧群的灵魂，不再呼吁净化。他的人民陷入了深深的绝望之中，渴望寻得安慰，愿意听从于任何能赐予他们安宁、减轻他们痛苦的力量。
languages.original_text: The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

traits.locale_text: 慈父纳垢那令人作呕的呼吸腐化了希罗尼穆斯牧师的布道。他开始宣扬无处不在的腐烂与污秽，折磨牧群的灵魂，不再呼吁净化。他的人民陷入了深深的绝望之中，渴望寻得安慰，愿意听从于任何能赐予他们安宁、减轻他们痛苦的力量。

languages.text: Der widerwärtige Atem von Großvater Nurgle vergiftete die Predigten von Reverend Hieronymus. Er predigte von der Allgegenwärtigkeit von Fäulnis und Makel und forderte keine Läuterung mehr, sondern quälte stattdessen die Seelen seiner Anhänger. Die Gläubigen waren verzweifelt und sehnten sich nach Trost. Sie waren bereit, sich vor jeder Macht zu verneigen, die ihnen Frieden und Erlösung von ihrem Leid versprechen konnte.
languages.original_text: The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Der widerwärtige Atem von Großvater Nurgle vergiftete die Predigten von Reverend Hieronymus. Er predigte von der Allgegenwärtigkeit von Fäulnis und Makel und forderte keine Läuterung mehr, sondern quälte stattdessen die Seelen seiner Anhänger. Die Gläubigen waren verzweifelt und sehnten sich nach Trost. Sie waren bereit, sich vor jeder Macht zu verneigen, die ihnen Frieden und Erlösung von ihrem Leid versprechen konnte.

languages.text: Le souffle nauséabond du Père Nurgle empoisonna les sermons du révérend Hiéronymus, qui se mit à prêcher l'omniprésence de la pourriture et de la souillure. Ainsi, au lieu d'appeler à la purification, il tourmentait les âmes de ses ouailles. En quête de réconfort dans le désespoir qui les accablait, ses fidèles étaient prêts à accepter toute puissance supérieure qui leur promettrait de soulager leurs souffrances et de leur apporter la paix.
languages.original_text: The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Le souffle nauséabond du Père Nurgle empoisonna les sermons du révérend Hiéronymus, qui se mit à prêcher l'omniprésence de la pourriture et de la souillure. Ainsi, au lieu d’appeler à la purification, il tourmentait les âmes de ses ouailles. En quête de réconfort dans le désespoir qui les accablait, ses fidèles étaient prêts à accepter toute puissance supérieure qui leur promettrait de soulager leurs souffrances et de leur apporter la paix.

languages.text: El aliento nauseabundo del abuelo Nurgle envenenó los sermones del reverendo Hieronymus. Predicando la omnipresencia de la podredumbre y la corrupción, dejó de llamar a la purificación para atormentar las almas de su rebaño. Su gente desesperada estaba dispuesta a rendirse a cualquier fuerza que les prometiera paz y alivio de su sufrimiento.
languages.original_text: The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

traits.locale_text: El aliento nauseabundo del abuelo Nurgle envenenó los sermones del reverendo Hieronymus. Predicando la omnipresencia de la podredumbre y la corrupción, dejó de llamar a la purificación para atormentar las almas de su rebaño. Su gente desesperada estaba dispuesta a rendirse a cualquier fuerza que les prometiera paz y alivio de su sufrimiento.

languages.text: ヒエロニムス司祭の説教は、師父ナーグルの吐き気を催すような息に毒されていた。腐敗と汚れの遍在を説く彼は、もはや浄化を呼びかけることはなく、代わりに群れの魂を苦しめた。絶望に堕ち、慰めを渇望する民衆は、安らぎと苦しみからの解放を約束してくれるのなら、どんな力でも喜んで屈服した。
languages.original_text: The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムス司祭の説教は、師父ナーグルの吐き気を催すような息に毒されていた。腐敗と汚れの遍在を説く彼は、もはや浄化を呼びかけることはなく、代わりに群れの魂を苦しめた。絶望に堕ち、慰めを渇望する民衆は、安らぎと苦しみからの解放を約束してくれるのなら、どんな力でも喜んで屈服した。

languages.text: Büyükbaba Nurgle'ın mide bulandırıcı nefesi, Muhterem Hieronymus'un vaazlarını zehirledi. Çürümüşlüğün ve kirlenmişliğin her yere yayıldığından söz ediyor, arınmayı ağzına almıyor, takipçilerinin ruhlarındaki kedere odaklanıyordu. Onu dinleyenlerse umutsuzluğa düşüyor, teselli arayışına girişiyor ve huzur ve iç rahatlığı vadeden her türlü güce boyun eğecek duruma geliyordu.
languages.original_text: The nauseating breath of Grandfather Nurgle poisoned the sermons of Reverend Hieronymus. Preaching the omnipresence of rot and taint, he no longer called for purification but tormented the souls of his flock instead. Fallen into despair and craving solace, his people were willing to bow to any force that could promise peace and relief from their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Büyükbaba Nurgle'ın mide bulandırıcı nefesi, Muhterem Hieronymus'un vaazlarını zehirledi. Çürümüşlüğün ve kirlenmişliğin her daim her yerde olduğundan söz ediyor, arındırmaktan konuşmuyor, takipçilerinin ruhlarındaki kedere odaklanıyordu. Onu dinleyenler umutsuzluğa düşüyor, teselli arayışına girişiyor ve huzur ve ızdıraptan kurtulma vadeden her türlü güce boyun eğecek hâle geliyordu.
